create-playlist.PLAYLIST_NAME_EXISTS: There is already a playlist named **{{playlistName}}** in your saved playlists!
create-playlist.GENERIC_ERROR: There was a problem executing this command, please try again later

delete-playlist.PLAYLIST_REMOVED: I removed **{{playlistName}}** from your saved playlists!

leave.NOT_IN_VC: :no_entry: Please join a voice channel and try again!
leave.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
leave.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!

loop-queue.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
loop-queue.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
loop-queue.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to use that!
loop-queue.LOOP_SONG_ON: :x: Turn off the **loop** command before using the **loopqueue** command
loop-queue.LOOP_DISABLED: :repeat: The queue is no longer playing on **loop**
loop-queue.LOOP_ENABLED: :repeat: The queue is now playing on **loop**

loop.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
loop.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
loop.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!
loop.LOOP_DISABLED: **{{song}}** is no longer playing on repeat :repeat:

lyrics.SONG_NOT_FOUND: :x: No song has been found for this query
lyrics.GENERIC_ERROR: There was a problem fetching lyrics for this song, please try again
lyrics.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing! Enter a song name or play a song
lyrics.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!

move.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
move.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
move.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!
move.INVALID_POSITION: :x: Try again and enter a valid song position number

music-trivia.START:
:notes: Get ready! There are {{length}} songs, you have 30 seconds to guess either the singer/band or the name of the song. Good luck!
    Vote skip the song by entering the word 'skip'.
    You can end the trivia at any point by using the end-trivia command!`
music-trivia.NOT_IN_VC: :no_entry: Please join a voice channel and try again!
music-trivia.TRACK_IS_PLAYING: You can't use this command while a track is playing!
music-trivia.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!

pause.NOT_IN_VC: :no_entry: Please join a voice channel and try again!
pause.NO_SONG_PLAYING: There is no song playing right now!
pause.NOT_IN_SAME_VC: You must be in the same voice channel as the bot in order to do that!
pause.SUCCESS: :pause_button: Song was paused! To unpause, use the resume command
pause.FAIL: Unable to pause this song, please try again soon

play.NOT_IN_VC: :no_entry: Please join a voice channel and try again!
play.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
play.PLAY_CALL_RUNNING: Please wait until the last play call is processed

queue-history.NO_HISTORY: There is no music queue history!

queue.TRIVIA_IS_RUNNING: You can't use this command while a trivia is running!
queue.NO_SONGS: :x: There are no songs in queue!
